document.full_text: loud explosions shook tripoli on monday night in what appeared to be stepped up nato air strikes on the libyan capital, and rebel forces seized a town in the west, driving out muammar gaddafi's forces.
document.title: explosions in tripoli, rebels seize libyan town
lines_and_colors: loud explosions shook tripoli on monday night in what appeared to be stepped up nato air strikes on the libyan capital, and rebel forces seized a town in the west, driving out muammar gaddafi's forces.
